meanings.definition: Make (water, air, soil, etc.) dirty and impure.
meanings.sent1: Please do not pollute the river by throwing trash into it.
meanings.sent2: Factories that release chemicals into the air can pollute the environment.
meanings.sent3: It would be silly to pollute your own drinking water source.
meanings.sent4: The negative gossip began to pollute the atmosphere of the office.
meanings.sent5: The oil spill continued to pollute the ocean, harming marine life.

meanings.sent1: We must not pollute the forest with toxic waste.
meanings.sent2: Improper disposal of batteries can pollute the soil.
meanings.sent3: It's like trying to pollute a clean slate with unnecessary complications.
meanings.sent4: The lies began to pollute the relationship between the two friends.
meanings.sent5: The invasive species started to pollute the delicate ecosystem of the lake.
